Alpharetta.North Point Community Church: North Point Community Church is a non-denominational, evangelical Christian megachurch located in Alpharetta, Georgia, a suburb of Atlanta. North Point currently averages more than 36,000 people in attendance among its six campuses each week, making it the largest church in Metro Atlanta and according to Outreach Magazine, the largest church in the United States as of 2014. Andy Stanley is the senior pastor.
